Articles.Content:
I swear there was a mod that let you remove a given part from the editor part catalog, without actually deleting it from the /Game Data/ directory.

The reason is so that it doesn't break already constructed craft.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-07T05:54:14Z" title="05/07/2015 05:54  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 7, 2015</time> by Nothalogh**

@PART[PartName]{    category = none}

Insert part name field and drop in any .cfg

> 
> @PART[PartName]{    category = none}
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Insert part name field and drop in any .cfg

Hmm, that means I could batch that in a MM config, right?
Yes, because it is a MM patch ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Thank you, it works, and I am now rid of those horrid stock small landing gear
May I ask what landing gears are you using? Bahamuto's?

> 
> May I ask what landing gears are you using? Bahamuto's?

Yes, that's them.

The landing gear that should be stock
